nodes.text: Lothal Depot, also known as the Jalath City depot, was a landing area near the city of Jalath on Lothal, a planet in the Outer Rim Territories. During the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, Princess Leia Organa brought three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes to Lothal Depot so the rebels could steal them, thus giving Alderaan plausible deniability regarding its involvement in the rebellion. The rebels raided Lothal Depot and successfully stole the ships.
